column4: Is there a way to turn of where pidgin tells you every time someone leaves or enters, maybe for a channel? There's more leave/enter notices then actual chat
Yes, its a plugin
Its the Join/Part Hiding Plugin, v2.6.1
Where can I get it/ what is it called?
Go into synaptic and download all the available plugin packs for Pidgin and you'll get it
Thanks, I'll be back in awhile
After you do that, go to Pidgin>Tools>Plugins then check the box next to "Join/Part Hiding"
Thanks, it must be working, or people suddenly stopped connecting to the ubuntu channel
What that does is hides any join/part messages that are not active users.  For example, if they do not type anything in chat, it will hide the notification that they joined or left
thats smart
what was it?
I dreamed that Microsoft took Ubuntu, made this http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php/Nimbus-Aero+Improved+?content=113537 the default theme and called it Windows
Good thing that the FSF exists, even if i'm not as radical as them, I know they would make a ton of noise if that happend
Free Software Foundation, the GNU guys, the GPL licence writers
Its only a matter of time before MS does something like that, though
they might be to proud to admit they failed to make a good OS
And if they do this, they can easily avoid having to admit that
I guess they could sell it, but anyone could make copies that were identical legally, so the free marked would make the disks like a dollar
PM me...I can make you laugh
uhh, I'm new to IRC , how do I do that?
Right click on my name then click IM
